title: Rosethorn, Part 2
guest: Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Guy English;Kathy Campbell;Mikah Sargent
summary: Are two monks better than one? With Li and Diendo trying to figure out what a mysterious elf has to do with the recent spate of wagon heists in Whitesparrow, we may find out! Joined by Quewaris, O’Lee, L’nel, and Thamia, our adventurers split up to search for clues, visit a few familiar merchants (but don’t seem to meet any maniacs), and perform a switcheroo on a suspect’s packing cubes.

title: Rosethorn, Part 1

summary: What happens when a few adventurers get in the way of a heist? Find out in “Rosethorn!” Adventurers Quewaris, O’Lee, Li, Thamia, L’nel and Diendo discover that bear traps can be as dangerous as any dragon, if your level is low enough!

summary: Getting back into the light is good, but our party—Samson Jothem, Thamia, Li, K’ulkat, and Quewaris—hasn’t gotten to the bottom of the problems in the local mine. Who is turning miners into monsters? The mine is opening in one day. There’s not a lot of time to solve the mystery!

guest: Dan Moren;Aleen Simms;Kathy Campbell;Jason Snell;James Thomson
summary: Two bards, an artificer, a monk, and a fighter are lowered into a mine in a basket. They meet a monster and then hide behind a basket! Will they survive, flee to the surface, or get melted into skeletons?

title: The Well of the Black Sun, Part 1
guest: James Thomson;Aleen Simms;Kathy Campbell;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: Samson Jothem, Thamia, Li, K’ulkat, and Quewaris—wait, who let two bards into this adventure?—venture outside of Whitesparrow to a mining town that’s being vexed by strange attacks, both on the surface and down in the mine. There’s a big reward awaiting them if they can get to the bottom of it!

title: The Dwarven Vault, Part 2
guest: James Thomson;Steve Lutz;Annette Wierstra;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: K’ronng, K’ulkat, Ch’omasa, Samson Jothem, and Diendo Fatrabbit have pursued the wild animal attacks back to their source—an ill-fated expedition into an ancient Dwarven treasure trove! There’s gold to be won, but can the adventurers—some of them horribly poisoned—find a way to stop the source of the strange animal attacks happening in the countryside?

title: The Dwarven Vault, Part 1
guest: Jason Snell;James Thomson;Steve Lutz;Annette Wierstra;Monty Ashley
summary: Dire Wolves roam the streets of Whitesparrow! Adventurers K’ronng, K’ulkat, Ch’omasa, Samson Jothem, and Diendo Fatrabbit are enjoying a nice day at the pub, but it’s all ruined by a spectacularly unlikely wildlife attack. Where did these crazed creatures come from? (The giant hand at the center of Whitesparrow is probably not involved.)

title: Moon Jerks

title: Wolfageddon
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Mikah Sargent;Dan Moren;Jane Ritt
summary: So. Many. Wolves.

title: A Face Is a Map of a Person

title: Skeletal Cats
guest: Mikah Sargent;Jane Ritt;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Dan Moren
summary: The Dog & Pony Show returns, and it’s still Shocktober! What’s spookier than Barovia? A spooky, cluttered attic in Barovia. Spookier than that? A spooky, cluttered attic populated by skeletal cats! EVEN SPOOKIER? A stroppy teenage wizard and his “students”.

title: My Favorite Flavor is 'Combination'
guest: Mikah Sargent;Jane Ritt;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Annette Wierstra
summary: Our second run through “A Night in Seyvoth Manor” comes to an end. What’s in the flesh book? What surprise do the Mystery Wagon gang have in store for the vampiric dealmaster, Malthus Seyvoth? Will resurrected monster Henry find love with his vampire girlfriend? Some of your questions may be answered!

title: I Wish For Fewer Bones
guest: Mikah Sargent;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Jane Ritt;Annette Wierstra
summary: A fleshy tome and a magic circle suggest a deal with a demon could be near. And pizza rolls might not be far behind. But if you’ve already made a deal with a vampire, does a demon deal define double dealing? Look, we’ve been at this a long time and it’s almost over. But not quite yet.

title: The Pizza Rolls Argument
guest: Jane Ritt;Annette Wierstra;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Mikah Sargent
summary: When we last left the Scüpy Gang, they were entering the lair of villanous Count Mathus Seyvoth, who might be a vampire or maybe an umpire. 11 months later, it’s time to throw open the doors and discover the horrors—and great deals!—that await inside. Will our adventurers be able to resist the hard sell? And can a Zone of Truth spell really stop a master salesman?

title: Ask the Dungeon Masters!
summary: To celebrate our 250th episode, we take a break from playing and ask Scott, Dan, and Tony to answer listener questions!

summary: The Dog & Pony gang ends the season with a festival full of rain, a room full of dolls, an attic full of junk, and a door full of lightning!

title: Backgammon in the Wine Gazebo

summary: Never split the party! Unless you’re going to do some chores and take a furtive walk around town.

title: Let's Bury the Burgermeister
guest: Dan Moren;Jane Ritt;Erika Ensign;Mikah Sargent;Aleen Simms
summary: The Dog and Pony Show returns! With the same dog… but a new pony. And new players! And a new DM! Please enjoy this trip to a tavern in Little Borovia, and watch Tony die a little bit inside in the service of Dungeons and Dragons.

title: Seize Him!
guest: Myke Hurley;Adina Hurley;James Thomson;Lizbeth Myles;Tiff Arment;Jason Snell
summary: In this episode, our adventure comes to its end. A while ago, the Adventurers’ Pyramid installed Calcryx the white dragon as the ruler of the Sunless Citadel, with Meepo as its right-hand kobold. Unintended consequences can be tough. Will the adventurers escape with their lives and their treasure? If they can, they’re definitely going to make the front page of the next issue of Oakhurst & Beyond!

title: Food Pyramid

summary: It’s good to learn things. Where does the Hobgoblin fit in the hierarchy of D&D monsters? If you’re killed by an arrow, does the second arrow really do damage? And how much blood can spill out of the bodies of unconscious adventurers who were just trying to get back to the surface and claim their reward? Also: Meet Bobgoblin the Hobgoblin!

Will he welcome back his old companion Meepo, or does he view our party’s Kobold sidekick as an enemy? Only one way to find out!

Or will it be death for Meepo the Kobold?

summary: Our adventurers visit a mansion to receive an assignment, participate in a team-building exercise, and climb down a rope into a subterranean gulf of darkness.

title: Oakhurst & Beyond
guest: Jason Snell;James Thomson;Lizbeth Myles;Myke Hurley;Adina Hurley;Tiff Arment
summary: We begin a new TPK season with an almost entirely new collection of players! In the small town of Oakhurst, many adventurers are gathering. Is there trouble on the horizon? Probably! Does the town’s local newspaper have a surprisingly broad circulation? Seemingly! Does that demon lady really think her weasel is a fox? Possibly! Step inside the tavern and get ready for some Dragonborn rock and roll.

title: Oakhurst & Beyond
guest: Jason Snell;James Thomson;Lizbeth Myles;Myke Hurley;Adina Hurley;Tiff Arment
summary: We begin a new TPK season with an almost entirely new collection of players! In the small town of Oakhurst, many adventurers are gathering. Is there trouble on the horizon? Probably! Does the town’s local newspaper have a surprisingly broad circulation? Seemingly! Does that demon lady really think her weasel is a fox? Possibly! Step inside the tavern and get ready for some Dragonborn rock and roll.

title: Drugs are Good
guest: Jane Ritt;Annette Wierstra;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Mikah Sargent
summary: The end of Shocktober 2019 is in sight, but rather than taking on the evil Lord Seyvoth directly, our adventurers have chosen to mop up a bunch of side quests, with the help of speed, steroids, and other questionable substances. IT ALL ENDS HERE! UNTIL NEXT YEAR!

title: The Ghost in the Gazebo
guest: Jane Ritt;Annette Wierstra;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Mikah Sargent
summary: At long last ScÃ¼p and the gang have reached the top floor of Seyvoth Manor! But there are some puzzles to solve and sheet music to obtain before this adventure can reach its conclusion…

title: Cool Ranch Blood
guest: Jane Ritt;Annette Wierstra;Mikah Sargent;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz
summary: So many creepy mansion rooms for the Mystery Wagon gang to explore, so little time! How will they keep Fluffy and Henry from drinking from a blood fountain? What’s the message that a ghost in a mirror has to impart, and does it involve amazing bargains on mirrors? And Henry grapples with returning memories of his life before death. But in a spooky way because he’s a Fantasy Canadian Frankenstein Monster now!

title: A Light Tinge of Evil
guest: Jane Ritt;Annette Wierstra;Mikah Sargent;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz
summary: As Shocktober 2019 continues, ScÃ¼p and the gang continue fleeing a necrotic vortex, and then explore Seyvoth Manor’s equally spooky attic! Will this adventure continue to teach our players that books are dangerous? Probably!

title: That's Not Billy
guest: Annette Wierstra;Jane Ritt;Mikah Sargent;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz
summary: We return to our spooky second run-through of A Night in Seyvoth Manor, with a somewhat familiar, but legally distinct, set of characters. It’s time to venture up to the second floor of the house! Will Fluffy drink something else magical and poisonous? And will those stuffed bears the characters keep finding help defuse a tense situation with a g-g-g-ghost? Find out as SHOCKTOBER 2019 begins!

title: Good Cop, Bad Cop, Handsome Cop
guest: Sarah Barbour;Erika Ensign;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Enda the Rogue has been found at last! But there’s a task Dragonforge & Associates must perform before they can return to the hunt for Rutherford Urmbrusk. What could go wrong?[Dragonforge & Associates will return in 2020. For the next five weeks, we return to Seyvoth Manor for SHOCKTOBER 2019 and then a new adventure premieres.]

title: A Closet Full of Corpses
guest: Monty Ashley;Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: This battle is the pits! No, really, there are two pits. Our adventurers use acrobatics, hypnosis, and arrows to attempt to subdue far-off enemies.

title: Take Cover Behind Your Wizard
guest: Monty Ashley;Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Dragonforge and Associates are reunited, and it feels so good. Also, it turns out putting your wizard in front of the party is not a smart move.We are starting a new TPK campaign and will be playing it live on weeknights just for Incomparable members. There’s a trailer for the campaign at the beginning of this episode. Visit our membership page to sign up and get access to live streams, video replays, audio bootlegs, and even final edited episodes months before anyone else gets to see us play. And you’ll be supporting our DMs and players!

title: Our Cleric Has the Bloodlust
guest: Sarah Barbour;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell;Brian Hamilton;Jane Ritt
summary: What’s the difference between a real alligator and a fake chicken? It’s an important lesson, but not as important as remembering not to touch the mushrooms.

title: Snakes in a Turtleneck
guest: Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz;Erika Ensign;Dan Moren;Annette Wierstra
summary: Ask not for whom the scythe swings—it swings for thee. There’s also an unpleasant amount of vomit, and an even more unpleasant amount of snakes!

title: Awkward Alligator
guest: Sarah Barbour;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell;Brian Hamilton;Jane Ritt
summary: Statue mimics! Alligators! Spiderwebs! What could go wrong?

title: Sewer Vide
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Annette Wierstra
summary: Crocodiles. Why’d it have to be crocodiles.

title: Ooze on First?
guest: Sarah Barbour;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell;Brian Hamilton;Jane Ritt
summary: Robot scorpion or not? How could a scummy pool be dangerous? Why are statues so terrifying? Very few of these questions are answered!

title: I Think Your Elf is Broken
guest: Steve Lutz;Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Annette Wierstra;Dan Moren
summary: The other half of Dragonforge and Associates slowly unburies itself, meets two strangers, and then has some fairly typical sewer problems.

title: Pitfall Situation
guest: Sarah Barbour;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell;Brian Hamilton;Jane Ritt
summary: Rocks fell! Everyone maybe didn’t die! But who is left alive and awake from Dragonforge and Associates? Also, why does that lizard person look so familiar?

title: Grifters Are Like Zombies
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Sarah Barbour;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Monty Ashley
summary: This room is really big. Our adventurers continue to battle rogues and scoundrels and possibly there might also be some lizard people around? There’s a lot going on. And stay tuned for the exciting cliffhanger ending!

title: You'll Never Be Bandit 2 Now, Pal
guest: Sarah Barbour;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell;Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz
summary: This episode covers all facets of the underworld of Undermountain—scoundrels, kneebreakers, and grifters. Our adventurers try to rescue an urchin! And what would a Dragonforge adventure be without some Ding Dongs?

title: A Dwarf with a Hangover
guest: Steve Lutz;Georgia Dow;Erika Ensign;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell;Sarah Barbour
summary: Have you heard the good news about lycanthropy? Our adventurers visit with their new friends in the werewolf cult, who are very interested in signing up some new recruits. Also, our party gets its dwarf back! Shh, stop cheering, she’s got a really bad headache.

title: How Not to Be Seen
guest: Steve Lutz;Erika Ensign;Monty Ashley;Georgia Dow;Jason Snell
summary: Which is better, diplomacy or intimidation? This episode might reveal the answer! And then we flip the map and spend a lot of time pondering the Z axis as our adventurers climb down a giant statue. What’s at the bottom? Nothing good, that’s for sure.

title: High Fantasy in the Low Sewers
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: Proving that Tony thinks that no D&D adventure is complete without a trip to the sewers, our adventurers once again trudge through the sewers. Will Pieter fall in the sludge again? Will Olestran forget to mark something as his quarry? And are those rats, or giant rats?

title: Thieves Cant is a Beautiful Language
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: Watch out Undermountain, because the best team of adventurers-slash-sandwich shop promoters is back on the case! Dragonforge and Associates are still on their quest to find Rutherford Umbrusk, and the latest lead in the case takes them to the seediest part of Waterdeep to bargain with some questionable characters. How will they mess this one up? Listen to find out!

title: Tepanyaki Vampire
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Tony Sindelar;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: This mini-season of Eglath’s Angels concludes with a deadly vampire battle, a powerful wizard, and a talking hammer.

title: A Hug in the Darkness
guest: Steve Lutz;Aleen Simms;Jason Snell;Erika Ensign;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren
summary: Johnny Nine is alive! Our friends and their newfound Golem navigate turnstiles, boiling mud, and darkness. What’s in the darkness, and why does it want to hug Eglath’s Angels… to death?

title: Golem Storage Area
guest: Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Three dummies smash orbs in a locked room. Three bored adventurers wait in a hallway. Then there’s a riddle involving a flesh golem.

title: Too Many Orbs
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Our mini-season of Eglath’s Angels continues with a series of curious decisions. Flesh golems? No thank you! Creepy room full of suspended colored orbs? Yes please! And why do a dumb thing once when you can do it twice?

title: Not Much of a Mountain
guest: Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Erika Ensign;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Aleen Simms
summary: Eglath’s Angels return! Your original crew of TPK knuckleheads is back, but they’re not on Athas anymore. In this special mini-season, they’ve been swept onto a different plane, where they’ll play in a classic D&D module! But first, Carlos attacks a tree.

title: I'm a Herder, Not a Fighter
guest: Annette Wierstra;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: In the thrilling conclusion to Dungeon Crawl Classics, the world’s foremost experts in elevators try to unlock the secrets of a strange new weapon and fight an ant man. Will they discover the truth about what lies in the heart of the glacier? Should Monty buy new dice? And what strange fate awaits our cave people?

title: The Warning Birds
guest: Annette Wierstra;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: Our first generation of characters is dwindling! Which villagers will step up to the task, and how many caveman bodies will they have to step over to join our party? Doors will be opened! Lizards will be kicked! Art will be appreciated! And a legally-distinct enemy will have our adventurers desperate to roll something higher than a ten.

title: Snake Preview
guest: Annette Wierstra;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: Meet Chuck the Dwarf! He’s a flintknapper extraordinaire who’s going to help lead the party through more underground tubes than they’ve ever seen before. Plus, you won’t believe what kind of security system this glacier has!

title: A Million Nerds Skanking
guest: Erika Ensign;Annette Wierstra;Monty Ashley;Aleen Simms;Jason Snell
summary: An entire cave-dwelling village is mobilized to find the cause of mysterious smoke coming from the local mountain! Tony Sindelar DMs a new crew of characters as they journey from Hither to Yon. It’s a rip-roaring good time!

title: Dragon vs. Octopus
guest: Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Mikah Sargent;Aleen Simms;Tony Sindelar
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 20
summary: This is it, people! The season finale finds our adventurers up against a terrifying black dragon after literally no preparation or strategic planning. Will they survive to reunite the dog with the pony?

title: Tenser's Floating Dog
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 19
summary: The Dog and Pony team finally investigate the forge, then traverse a chain ladder into the depths of the caves. Ladders and bridges take a long time to figure out. After all that trouble, they’re rewarded with something much worse than they expected.

title: I Don't Trust This Table
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 18
summary: Now that Spurious knows how his go-to spell actually works, he puts it to serious, fatal use. Then the team goes on a wild Duergar chase that leads to a bathroom, a closet, and a secret tunnel. This party is really really bad at secret doors.

title: What Do You Smell Besides Corpses?
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 17
summary: Our intrepid (or maybe just tepid) adventurers continue to explore the old Dwarven ruins. How many adventurers does it take to read a scroll? The answer is too many.

title: The Room Really Ties the Rug Together
guest: Tony Sindelar;Mikah Sargent;Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 16
summary: In the life of every party there comes a time to make a gruesome decision about how to defeat one’s foes. Though not every party can notice a rug and a suit of armor, but fail to notice an entire room full of corpses.

title: Wight Privilege
guest: Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Mikah Sargent;Aleen Simms;Tony Sindelar
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 15
summary: What happens when you ignore a warning sign? A really long, scary battle! But if you live through it, you just might finally get a long rest. And maybe meet a ggg-ghost!

title: All Orc Poetry is Slam Poetry
guest: Mikah Sargent;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Tony Sindelar
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 14
summary: The Dog and Pony gang investigate the forge, and learn some important lessons: Do not trust furniture, but do trust literal warning signs.

title: Rope Me Once, Shame on Me...
guest: Mikah Sargent;Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Tony Sindelar
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 13
summary: Bruldish fights with her cousins, and we see a whole new side of Elavor. But will the adventurers ever find the forge?

title: Hell Bent for Orc Leather
guest: Mikah Sargent;Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Aleen Simms;Tony Sindelar
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 12
summary: How many adventurers does it take to find a secret door? The answer is too many.

title: Stalag-fight!
guest: Mikah Sargent;Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Tony Sindelar;Erika Ensign
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 11
summary: How many tentacles does a Roper have? The answer is too many.

title: Mr. Roper
guest: Mikah Sargent;Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Tony Sindelar;Erika Ensign
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 10
summary: When is a flopping fish not just a flopping fish? When it’s attached to something that’s trying to eat you.

title: The Secret of the Ooze
guest: Mikah Sargent;Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Tony Sindelar;Erika Ensign
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 9
summary: Will our adventurers finally get a long rest? How big is this cave system anyway? What can you do with two magic hands? Do skeletons have belongings? This episode brings you the answers to questions you probably didn’t have.

title: Bop, Don't Boop!
guest: Aleen Simms;Mikah Sargent;Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Tony Sindelar
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 8
summary: In this episode, our adventurers meet more stinky cave-dwellers, learn the difference between bopping and booping, and one of them swings their weapon at an empty square for some reason. Listen and find out why!

title: Tunnel Pragmatism
guest: Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Aleen Simms;Mikah Sargent;Tony Sindelar
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 7
summary: Successful cave exploration requires management skills, rope, and a truly epic weaponized hootenany

title: Sprinklebard!
guest: Tony Sindelar;Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Mikah Sargent
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 6
summary: Elavor talks to a bear.

title: We Deserve This
guest: Erika Ensign;Mikah Sargent;Brian Hamilton;Aleen Simms;Tony Sindelar
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 5
summary: Psst, hey, buddy, ya wanna buy a feather?

title: Don't Eat Strange Bees!
guest: Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Mikah Sargent;Aleen Simms;Tony Sindelar
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 4
summary: Come for the orcs, stay for the bee-themed acrobatics.

title: This Party Is Complicated
guest: Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Mikah Sargent;Aleen Simms;Tony Sindelar
topic: Dog and Pony Show II, Part 3
summary: Deeper into the mountain we go! Remember all those warnings about orcs? They’re proven to be true! Also we learn where orcs sleep. (It’s beds. They sleep in beds.)

title: Dog and Pony Show
guest: Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Mikah Sargent;Tony Sindelar
topic: Dog and Pony Show (Death House) II, Part 2
summary: It’s time to leave town and set out on an adventure! Having given up on their missing compatriot (for now), the party takes a chance on canine companionship and comes up with its official name at last. Now it’s off to the mountains to seek fame, fortune, and forgotten treasure.

title: Our Monk Is Missing
guest: Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Mikah Sargent;Tony Sindelar
topic: Dog and Pony Show (Death House) II, Part 1
summary: They touched an orb! They barely survived Death House! (See Episode 105 through 112.) Now Imra and the people she saved are back, in a new adventure. Once again DM stands for Dan Moren, as Dan leads a group of familiar adventurers into new challenges and, most intriguingly, an encounter with a musical halfling riding a pony that might change the course of their adventuring careers forever.

title: The Cultists Aren't That Flammable
summary: Trader Vi, Tyla, Jeff, and Sizzle Drop continue their quest to apologize to a cult. Will our heroes be thwarted by trick statues, a fire pit, and a Wario lookalike? How many cultists are still alive? And what bizarre sounds will Sizzle Drop make?

title: Official Mayoral Business
summary: There’s a new DM in town! For two weeks, join Monty Ashley as he brings a group of travelers on an adventure to save a small town from the Cult of the Iron Scimitar.

title: A Dog, a Priest, and a Brain Surgeon
guest: Annette Wierstra;Jane Ritt;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Mikah Sargent
summary: Shocktober 2018 concludes in the cells beneath Seyvoth Manor! Will our adventurers find either of the missing children they’ve been searching for, or is it werewolves all the way down? Are books the best weapons of all? And most importantly, will our heroes survive to play again in 2019? Some of those questions will be answered, probably unsatisfactorily, in this episode!

title: Ichor Cole Slaw
guest: Annette Wierstra;Jane Ritt;Monty Ashley;Mikah Sargent;Steve Lutz
summary: Into the basement of Seyvoth Manor! What manner of horrible things can be found in the underbuildings of a haunted mansion? How do you feel about tentacles—wait, don’t answer that. How about doors and hallways? And what life lessons can the trash fire teach us? Shocktober 2018 nears its fateful conclusion!

title: AirDND
guest: Annette Wierstra;Jane Ritt;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Mikah Sargent
summary: Continuing a trip through a spooky haunted mansion, our adventurers check out some plants and then, against their better judgment and the advice of others, leave the vestibule and descend into the basement to see if dogs are qualified to do brain surgery. (Turns out they are!)

title: Send Me an Angel to Kill
guest: Monty Ashley;Annette Wierstra;Steve Lutz;Mikah Sargent;Jane Ritt
summary: There’s a library in Seyvoth Manor, once packed with books entertaining and informative. Now it lies in ruins, but a few magical books remain, with treasures and terrors in equal measure for those who are brave or foolish enough to explore. Like Fluffy, he’s plenty foolish enough.

title: I'm a Bard!
guest: Annette Wierstra;Steve Lutz;Mikah Sargent;Monty Ashley;Jane Ritt
summary: It’s time for Shocktober 2018! We’re back in Seyvoth Manor, but not the one you may have heard before! It’s a new edition of D&D, a newly built version of the story, and most importantly, an entirely new group of players and characters. And there’s something strangely familiar, yet legally distinct, about the group. In this, the first of five episodes, our adventurers enter the house, debate the differences between a foyer and a vestibule, ponder if dogs are a kind of plant, and attempt a duet with a piano-playing ghost.

title: Yan-C-Bin Expecting Me?
guest: Aleen Simms;Scott McNulty;Tony Sindelar;Erika Ensign;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: The third season of Eglath’s Angels comes to a conclusion! The fate of the Howling Hatred cult is revealed! Omlol takes a journey entirely unlike any we’ve seen before! Many members of the party are in grave danger! And for those who survive, what is their next destination?

title: Regdar's Unregulated School of Magic
guest: Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Dan Moren;Steve Lutz
summary: A room full of mushrooms (again?) teaches our adventurers a valuable lesson about… something? It’s finally time to meet the leaders of the windy cult. And despite Regdar’s best advice to refrain, Carlos shows off an extremely unexpected talent.

title: My Mom Raised Me Not to Lie to a Bird
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell
summary: Kenku are jerks. Our new friend is very wise for an undercover cultist. Our adventurers need to decide if they’re an ambulance service or not. (They’re not.)[If your episode sounds like Aleen is out of sync, please delete this episode and then re-download it! We had to re-release the episode to fix this audio problem.]

title: Hello from the Tragic Cavern
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren
summary: Presta is dead and her companions are all pretty horribly wounded, except for Carlos, who seems perfectly fine. Can this group of adventurers find their way out of these confounded caverns before they lose all hope? It may take an escape by, as you might expect with this group, a path entirely unexpected by the Dungeon Master.

title: That's My Clampy Hand!
guest: Brian Hamilton;Aleen Simms;Mikah Sargent;Erika Ensign;Jason Snell
summary: The Iron King, at last! But will our plucky adventurers survive their battle with a giant rabbit with an even more giant mechanical claw? Either way, Gamma World ends now in this mega-sized final episode!

title: Unreliable Jetpack
summary: Things are dire. Bobobob Joe is helplessly trapped in a laser grid and trying to remember his last words. E-84 is desperately trying to use its science skills to save the day. Can Carlos the giant mutated rabbit sniper take our our adventurers, or will they survive to face the Iron King at the center of the robot factory?

title: Roll Dump Truck
summary: A dangerous hallway. More robot security systems. There’s only one solution, and it’s Bobobob Joe putting his favorite toy at risk. This could be deadly for everyone if E-84 doesn’t execute one of the most amazing teleportation moves of all time…

title: File a Radar
summary: So we knew that there would be robots. The whole idea was to find and stop the source of the robots. But there are so many robots! And only one of them is looking for a lab coat. Fortunately, E-84 is also a robot and totally knows how to use control panels, right?

title: Robot or Not?
summary: This area is currently off limits, under orders of The Iron King. Visitor tours are on Tuesday. Please return then. Thank you for visiting Stupendico. Have a stupendous day! Get back to work, Carl!

title: Dump Zone
summary: Deeper into the tunnels go our adventurers, where they come into contact with some feisty robots and… do I smell bacon? Oh no, it’s more Roadhogs! They better hope they don’t get too close to Bobobob’s toy dump truck.

title: Robotic Neutral
summary: Machines vanquished and tables saved, it’s time to explore deeper into the realm of the Iron King, where there’s some tingly moss and nasty flying things.

title: Death and Dying in Gamma World
summary: As the quest for the Iron King continues, our adventurers face a roomful of angry badgers and one sinister buzzing machine. With their bodies in the kill zone and their backs against the only Ikea table to survive the apocalypse, it’s time to have an important rules discussion about how death-saving throws work in Gamma World.

title: Daiquiri Whacker
summary: It’s time to assault the tower from which the Iron King is sending his destructive robots. Can a zombie pig work as well as a fake ID? How horrifying is a bat-lion with laser beam eyes? Why are badgers so terrible at their jobs? Roll in the toy dump truck!

title: Zom-bacon
summary: Our adventure team stands on unsteady ground and battles some unpleasant badgers. Well, that’s not fair. Only one of them is unpleasant. Also, there’s a biker pig who has a really weird day.

title: Bob to the Third Degree
summary: Out of the post-apocalyptic wastes comes a brand-new band of adventurers — and a stream of mysterious, destructive robots, threatening the town of Town. Professor Rat sends a new team of interesting people (and a couple of interesting robots) to discover the source of the threat.

title: For Presta!
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: Battered and bloodied, our adventurers really want to be anywhere but where they are. How did we get in this mess, anyway? And is there any chance any of them can get out of it?

title: Oh Man, My Mouth Tastes Like Goodberry!
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell
summary: When you’re at the bottom of a bottomless pit and you’ve got no hit points left, who you gonna call? Mr. Goodberry! And he… actually may not be any help. Good luck!

title: Artisanal Gore
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: In which our adventurers break stuff and fall in a bottomless pit.

title: Ha Ha! You're In a Cult!
guest: Tony Sindelar;Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: Big wheel keep on turning, Carlos keep on running. We’re flute inspectors.

title: Turn Left at the Shallow Graves
guest: Dan Moren;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Tony Sindelar
summary: Heroic rescues, a murder hallway, and the big wheels keep on turning. You know, it’s just another day in Athas.

title: The Best Diplomacy Ever
guest: Dan Moren;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Aleen Simms;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell
summary: More Bugbears, more magic, more problems. Our adventurers make a few dozen tactical errors. But Carlos just wants to give diplomacy some time to work.

title: Got Kank Milk?
guest: Tony Sindelar;Erika Ensign;Dan Moren;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: In this episode Carlos wanders off once again, and once again nobody stops him. The healing properties of Kank Milk and its marketing opportunities are explored. Also, Heeeeeeere’s a Bugbear!

title: Famed Flautists
guest: Tony Sindelar;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Dan Moren
summary: Our adventurers abandon the Feathergale Spire and find an underground location in which they can continue to spread lies about who they are and what they’re inspecting.

title: Not All Manticores
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell
summary: In this one there’s an awful lot of skulking around the Feathergale spire. Plus, who doesn’t love a hunt?

title: An Auspicious Day
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell;Dan Moren
summary: Our party makes its way to Feathergale Spire, where it turns out that it is the anniversary of the founding of the Feathergale Knights. Time for a big party! With appetizers! And probably trouble. We’re like that.

title: Tattered Gray Cloak
guest: Erika Ensign;Tony Sindelar;Aleen Simms;Jason Snell;Dan Moren;Steve Lutz
summary: The Feathergale Spire is a tempting building on the horizon. A dead body in a ravine intrigues Carlos. You know, the usual.

title: Freedom!
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: Our adventurers haven’t been run out of town before, but this time it finally happens. Then they go on to Freedom, a town founded by slaves, and investigate the desert wastes in search of more clues to the fate of the missing caravan.

title: To the Sinkhole!
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren
summary: We’re quarry inspectors, actually. (This episode is not endorsed by the Kled Chamber of Commerce.)

title: The Mul Who Cried 'Boy'
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar
summary: It’s time to investigate the place where Carlos (who styles himself a hero) saved that kid, and then we’ll take a journey to the Cave of Floating Rocks to learn about the history of mining accidents on Athas!

title: He's Dead, J'ym
guest: Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: In the wake of Carlos opening a door that should have remained closed, the Bringers of Woe have come to bring the pain to our adventurers. Not everyone with a name will make it out alive!

title: Rat Sandwich
guest: Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Tony Sindelar;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: The adventurers investigate the underground complex beneath Kled, turning up a magic rock and a serious vermin infestation problem. Also, Carlos carefully studies a closed door and nobody notices until it’s too late.

title: A Taste of Kled
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren
summary: In this exciting return to the world of Dark Sun and Eglath’s Angels, pottery is purchased and giant sinkholes are investigated.

title: Batsbatsbatsbatsbatsbats
guest: Scott McNulty;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Jason Snell
summary: Shocktober comes to a spooky finale, at long last! Will our adventurers survive? What will be the fate of the two children they were tasked to save? Will Henry meet the fate of a Frankenstein (monster), or is there an exciting career as a Frankenstein (lawyer) ahead of him? It all ends here!

title: United States v. Dracula
guest: Brian Hamilton;Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Jason Snell;Scott McNulty
summary: The final battle begins! Our adventurers take on vampire lord Malthus Seyvoth and his undead accomplices as our Shocktober adventure reaches its climax! Who will escape alive?

title: Orbs McQuarrie
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Scott McNulty;Jason Snell
summary: The journey through the creepy (and deadly) hall of mirrors comes to an end! But who will be left alive to solve the final math problem?

title: The Mirror Has Two Faces
guest: Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Scott McNulty;Brian Hamilton;Jason Snell
summary: Deeper into the hall of mirrors! Our Shocktober adventurers grapple with some of their most terrifying foes yet: geometry and the possibility that they’ll need to solve a math problem. Plus energy beams and undead wraiths!

title: Please Roll Clockwork Bird
guest: Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Jason Snell;Scott McNulty
summary: For our third (and final!) spooky year, we return to Seyvoth Manor, where a crew of adventurers is desperately trying to survive a spooky house and rescue two children who have been kidnapped from their village. This Shocktober surprise features a previously unexplored room, a spooky doll, and a final ascent to the third floor of the manor, where the evil lord Seyvoth awaits…

title: Netflix and Kill
guest: Tony Sindelar;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Dan Moren;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Omlol learns an important lesson about asking doors and chests if they are mimics… the hard way! Then our adventurers return to Kled to have interesting conversations with uninteresting townspeople.

title: We're Hotel Inspectors
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Steve Lutz;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell;Dan Moren
summary: After a little more time annoying people in Kled, our adventurers head to the famed Trickle Rock Cave, where there is a little bit of trickling and a little bit of danger!

title: Party in the Front, Stables in the Back
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Dan Moren;Steve Lutz;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell
summary: Our party invades the city of Kled, splits the party, starts a hootenanny, makes new friends, and does what they do best—which is apparently lying unnecessarily?

title: A Chip Off the Old Rock
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar
summary:
We were in the desert 
 Everybody had matching tattoos 
 Somebody rolled into our flock 
 And we all saw a rock 
 It wasn’t a rock 
 It was a rock monster 
 Rock monster

title: Intimidate the Wind
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz
summary: In a bit of trouble with wind and templars, the adventurers of Eglath’s Angels take on a new mission to get themselves out of the city of Tyr for a little while. Turns out they’re just as bad at lying as they always were. And a new friend joins the party! But once they’re out in the desert, they’ll prove themselves to be cunning warriors… right?

title: This Is Turning Into a Death House
guest: Mikah Sargent;Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Scott McNulty;Brian Hamilton
summary: A final battle with greenery, and then our adventurers will try to escape from the Death House at last! But will the house truly live up to its diabolical name?

title: Fake Cult News
guest: Aleen Simms;Scott McNulty;Mikah Sargent;Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton
summary: Death House continues barreling toward its inevitable end! Will all our adventurers make it out alive?

title: Not My Centipedes, Not My Circus
guest: Mikah Sargent;Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Scott McNulty;Brian Hamilton
summary: From a hugging wall come creepy, hulking ghoulish creatures ready to kill (or hug?) our adventurers! And then later there may be a crypt with a whole lot of bugs.

title: The Legendary Hugging Wall
guest: Aleen Simms;Mikah Sargent;Brian Hamilton;Erika Ensign;Scott McNulty
summary: Death House resumes, and our adventurers must explore strange passageways, discovering deceptive items and even more deceptive walls!

title: Tugging on the Orb
guest: Mikah Sargent;Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Scott McNulty;Brian Hamilton
summary: So there’s this orb, and it’s pretty shiny. Maybe we should touch it?

title: Paladins Crying Uncontrollably
guest: Mikah Sargent;Brian Hamilton;Aleen Simms;Scott McNulty;Erika Ensign
summary: You’re a mean one, Mr. Grick. Also, Ghouls are not nice.

title: A Little Dust-Up
guest: Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Mikah Sargent;Scott McNulty
summary: The journey into Death House goes a little deeper, with creepy closets, creepy magical foes, and more creepy children!

title: All Children Are Creepy
guest: Aleen Simms;Erika Ensign;Brian Hamilton;Mikah Sargent;Scott McNulty
summary: A new adventure begins! Led by Dungeon Master Dan Moren, our adventurers wake from a night by a campfire to discover a deserted town, a couple of creepy kids, and a suspiciously creepy mansion.

title: We Wreck Everything We See
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Sarah Barbour;Serenity Caldwell;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley
summary: At long last, the final confrontation with the vampire lord! But will our adventurers’ previous actions in the Undermountain be to their own benefit, or will they play right into their enemy’s hands?

title: Cowering Behind a Wizard
guest: Erika Ensign;Serenity Caldwell;Sarah Barbour;Georgia Dow;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Our adventuring crew approaches its final destination, the lair of the vampire lord. But first, a seemingly innocuous anteroom with two pools in it! Surely nothing bad can happen here!

title: All Hands on Deck!
guest: Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Georgia Dow;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell;Serenity Caldwell
summary: What happens when you put a dude in a Ding-Dong? What’s the most menacing sort of high-five you could imagine? Things get much more dangerous as you close in on a diabolical vampire lord…

title: Please Avenge My Death
guest: Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell;Georgia Dow;Erika Ensign
summary: Pools and Ghouls! Creepy liquid and horrible wraiths and a surprising encounter with a Ding-Dong. The Undermountain dungeon crawl… er, crawls toward its climax!

title: Ask the Dungeon Masters
summary: In this special 100th edition, we take a break from the regular D&D playing to quiz all of our Dungeon Masters on questions supplied by Total Party Kill listeners.

title: That's Why You Should Floss
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Team Wraith takes the fight to Dragonforge and Associates.

title: The Corpse Is Dead!
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Sarah Barbour;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Dragonforge and Associates continue their winning ways and learn what “undead” means.

title: How Deep Is My Dagger?
guest: Serenity Caldwell;Georgia Dow;Sarah Barbour;Erika Ensign;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley
summary: Can our adventurers outwit a group of flaming suits of armor? Knowing our gang, it’s a toss-up. Plus, a zen garden of horrors!

title: What's Left of Pieter Dragonforge
guest: Georgia Dow;Jason Snell;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Sarah Barbour;Serenity Caldwell
summary: So… a Gelatinous Cube, eh? Ate Pieter Dragonforge and Flessa, you say? Did anyone survive?

title: Faraday Cube
guest: Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Georgia Dow;Serenity Caldwell;Sarah Barbour;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: You know what’s worse than giant spiders? The thing our adventurers find in the bottom of a pit, that’s what.

title: Team Spider
guest: Erika Ensign;Serenity Caldwell;Steve Lutz;Sarah Barbour;Georgia Dow;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: The battle with the giant spiders continues, with Olestran battling his fear and the rest of the group battling the actual spiders. And when that fun’s all done, it’s time to search the room for treasure!

title: Very Briefly Poisoned
guest: Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Sarah Barbour;Georgia Dow;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: Dragonforge and Associates return! To battle giant spiders! AAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH! SPIDERS!!!!!!!!!!

title: Science and Other Sciences
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Scott McNulty;Jason Snell
summary: Shocktober concludes for this year with a whole lot of magic books and an appeal to the Angel of Justice that doesn’t go as planned.

title: Brain Genie
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Scott McNulty;Jason Snell
summary: Our Shocktober adventure does the Monster Mash with an adventure in a spooky laboratory with a cabinet full of brains, a storage room that’s got more than meets the eye, and a secret attic altar with a bunch of forbidden books.

title: Toxic Vomit
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Scott McNulty;Jason Snell
summary: Shocktober continues! Our adventurers grapple with a giant shambling monster made up of the body parts of various animals. Many things are regurgitated! Gruther is slammed! Arrows are let fly! Prison cells are investigated! An objective is located—twice! And then there’s a duck. So tune in, Jimmy!

title: If You Build It, Bats Will Come
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Scott McNulty;Jason Snell
summary: Shocktober returns, and we return to Seyvoth Manor to continue our spooky crawl through a haunted house. Bats! Ghosts! Frankenstein’s Monsters! Shambling horrors! Who knows what spooky things we’ll find around the next corner…(This continues the story we played in episodes 61-64 last October.)

title: That's So Bahamut
guest: Sarah Barbour;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Our adventurers get in a little fighting before the episode becomes a whole lot more philosophical. Also, they try to pawn all the hard work off on someone who isn’t them.

title: Every Combat Begins with Kay
guest: Monty Ashley;Erika Ensign;Serenity Caldwell;Steve Lutz;Sarah Barbour;Jason Snell
summary: Helmed horrors conquered, there are ghouls to deal with. (Ghouls’ Night!) They are not easy to deal with. But if they can be dispatched, our adventurers will be gifted with… a mysterious corpse?

title: Seven Against Two Is the Best Odds
guest: Erika Ensign;Serenity Caldwell;Sarah Barbour;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley
summary: Dragonforge and Associates pick up after their Mummy battle, bind their wounds, and set out deeper into the crypt. Helmed horrors! Creepy lightning! Suspended skeletons! What an adventure awaits…(If you got an earlier version of this episode, it had an audio problem. This version is guaranteed to be good!)

title: This Really Ties the Room Together
guest: Georgia Dow;Erika Ensign;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Dragonforge and Associates consider the magical wiring diagram of the Tombs of the Undermountain, but someone ends up crying for their mummy. (Get it? MUMMY!)

title: Ding Dongs and Doolallys
guest: Georgia Dow;Erika Ensign;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;David J. Loehr;Brian Hamilton
summary: The battle with the flaming suits of armor continues! And then our adventurers interrogate some very strange prisoners.

title: Can We Crash at Your God's Place?
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Sarah Barbour;Serenity Caldwell;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: Now that the skeleton battle is over, we are welcomed into the Temple of Jergal by Brother Bathelby. There’s also a lot of listening at doors, life-sized chess, and some unpleasant suits of armor.

title: The Door Softened Them Up For Us
guest: Erika Ensign;Serenity Caldwell;Sarah Barbour;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Georgia Dow
summary: Our adventurers come to the door of Jeregal’s temple, but not without meeting some resistance! Also, in a special solo session, we find out what happened to Acrid the Dragonborn when he disappeared a few episodes ago.

title: Ghouls' Night!
guest: Erika Ensign;Serenity Caldwell;Sarah Barbour;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: After the battle with the zombies concludes, our adventurers investigate the tombs of Undermountain and discover some other terrifying creatures.

title: Between Two Sarcophagi
guest: Erika Ensign;Serenity Caldwell;Sarah Barbour;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz
summary: Our adventurers emerge through a trap door into the tombs of the Undermountain, in a room full of shambling zombies. Also, the party’s newest adventurer seems to be missing.

title: It's Never Too Late for Pew When You're in the Sewer
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Sarah Barbour;Serenity Caldwell;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: The sewer battle with the Tin Dog gang rages on, but for how long? And when it’s complete, what happens then? Also, nobody tell Pieter Dragonforge how bad his backpack smells.

title: Crossbow Friends!
guest: Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour;Serenity Caldwell;Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Monty Ashley
summary: There’s one place you never want to get in a knock-down, drag-out battle, and that’s the sewer. Unfortunately for Dragonforge & Associates, that’s just what has happened.

title: A Rather Substantial Tab
guest: Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Georgia Dow;Serenity Caldwell;Sarah Barbour;Jason Snell
summary: The press of bar bills and a lead on their search for Rutherford Urmbrusk convinces Dragonforge and Associates to return to adventuring, with a new member of their party and a whole new way to enter the Undermountain.

title: Where Do You See Yourself in Five Levels?
guest: Jason Snell;Serenity Caldwell;Erika Ensign;Moisés Chiullán;Georgia Dow;Glenn Fleishman
summary: Hello, from a not-very-magic tavern! In this prelude to a new season of Dragonforge & Associates fourth-edition D&D adventure, we return to the Yawning Portal in the city of Waterdeep, just around the corner from the bugbear-owned, kobold-operated sandwich shop, and reunite with Pieter Dragonforge, Kay, and Flessa. They are on one of the scariest of missions: Namely, trying to find a new member of the party by interviewing three candidates. Who will join the party and who will be left behind?

title: Axe Punch His Face
guest: Steve Lutz;Erika Ensign;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Georgia Dow;Jason Snell
summary: Our adventurers reach the summit of the Ziggurat and have their final confrontation with the Defiler and a threat that could destroy all of Athas.

title: Unguarded Crack
guest: Steve Lutz;Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: A fierce Mul gladiator (not Carlos) protects the interior of the ziggurat as our separated heroes struggle to reunite and defeat their enemies.

title: Two Muls, a Defiler, and a Beetle Place
guest: Georgia Dow;Erika Ensign;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz
summary: Eglath’s Angels conclude their encounter at the city gates and then journey deep into the city to explore a threatening ziggurat.

title: Magical Selfie Stick
guest: Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren
summary: Our adventurers approach the gates and statues that mark the entry point to the long-dead city of Kaldinay. But a funny thing happened on the way to the Ziggurat…

title: Strumming His Piccolo
guest: Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Georgia Dow;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: Freshly out of their pit, our heroes regroup and journey back out into the desert to find the source of the shaquat beetles at Fort Melidor. Also, we learn what a group of cacti is called, and discover some strange things about elven musical instruments.(This episode was initially released with the last 30 minutes of audio translated into Thri’Kreen. We’ve re-released it with the last 30 minutes in English, for our human listeners.)

title: Ways to Not Be a Beetle
guest: Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz
summary: The elemental magic-users seem to have what they want—Regdar’s crown—so you’d think the fight would be over. But our adventurers don’t know how to take “no” for an answer! There’s a dramatic transformation and an epic run that will go down in legend and song.

title: Epic Hat Destiny
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: The underground battle for Regdar’s crown has begun! And before it’s over, things are going to get tough for our adventurers.

title: Carlos, Have You Learned Nothing?
guest: Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell;Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren
summary: The battle with Carlos’s nemesis Morningstar is just the beginning of this adventure. There are accountants to terrorize and templars to badger! Will TPK turn into a courtroom drama? Anything’s possible with this group…

title: Is This Your Card?
guest: Dan Moren;Erika Ensign;Tony Sindelar;Georgia Dow;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz
summary: Combat combat combat! The battle with the spooky, speedy psionicist continues, and Carlos meets an old colleague and isn’t remotely happy to see him. Plus Regdar runs out of spells and Omlol hears the Good News about Carlos.

title: Descriptions & Doors
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell;Dan Moren
summary: Our adventurers return after a long absence (for them, not you) and after remembering where they are, they spend a whole lot of time listening at silent doors and sneaking down hallways, while preparing for the ultimate battle in the basement of the pottery emporium.

title: In That Trunk Is Some Funk
guest: Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Jason Snell;Georgia Dow;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz
summary: We return to the world of Eglath’s Angels, as our adventurers continue to clear out rooms full of sleepy guards before attempting an assault on the source of the mind-control beetles.

title: Have You Seen Billy?
guest: Erika Ensign;Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Warren Frey;Jason Snell;David J. Loehr
summary: Our Shocktober special concludes with more battles with plants, a speed run through the mansion as time is about to expire, some books, a chest, a Legend of Zelda reference, and more spoooooky ghosts.

title: Root of the Problem
guest: Brian Hamilton;Aleen Simms;Warren Frey;Jason Snell;Erika Ensign
summary: Our Shocktober special continues with two of the most terrifying things you’ll ever find in a haunted mansion: books and plants.

title: Jam Cabinet
guest: Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Jason Snell;Warren Frey;Erika Ensign;David J. Loehr
summary: In part two of our special four-part SHOCKTOBER SPECIAL, our adventurers attempt to get out of the cellar and into the mansion proper. What spooky spectres await them?

title: Knee Deep in Bat Guano
guest: Aleen Simms;Brian Hamilton;Erika Ensign;Jason Snell;Warren Frey
summary: In part one of our special four-part SHOCKTOBER SPECIAL, DM’s Dan and Tony take a new crew of five adventurers on a trip to a spoooooky mansion. (They may not make it past the front door.)

title: Bedroom Farce
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren
summary: Bedrooms, sleepy guards in loincloths, and a whole lot of confusion. Just another day at the office for our adventurers? Not hardly! Today’s the day they meet Chad.

title: The Murder Chute
guest: Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Georgia Dow;Erika Ensign;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar
summary: Our adventurers are still in the midst of their midnight raid into the unaffiliated pottery outpost that they suspect to be the center of the operation that’s distributing mind-control beetles far and wide. In this episode, they battle some guards near the fiery pottery kilns, toss a coin a time or two, make a descent through a hidden shaft, and open up some sacks of flour. Plus, Carlos shows off a few of his special talents.

title: Unaffiliated Pottery Outpost
guest: Georgia Dow;Erika Ensign;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: The adventurers return under cover of night to infiltrate the pottery outpost and uncover, at last, the source of the horrible beetle infestation! But do they want to try to kill guards who are just doing their jobs? Sometimes, when you’re fighting near a kiln, you start to wonder about killin’.

title: Full House
guest: Tony Sindelar;Georgia Dow;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: The adventurers return to Tyr and go to a pub, which is exactly what you’d expect. But this pub has a Mul with some very important info that he’d like to provide—if something terrible doesn’t happen to him first! Also, Regdar and some accomplices visit a notable pottery emporium.

title: Professional Monkey Paw Operator
guest: Erika Ensign;Dan Moren;Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Tony Sindelar
summary: In the aftermath of a horrible loss, our party struggles to stay alive against an onslaught of webbed and unwebbed Tembo. Is there any hope? Perhaps the slightest ruby glint…

title: Too Many Tembo
guest: Georgia Dow;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell
summary: With the caravan and the village of Red Obelisk behind them, and Scale back out of her protective bubble, our adventurers set off back to Tyr. Surely they wouldn’t have the bad luck to run into some dangerous, legendary bogeyman out in the desert, right? Right???

title: Beetles in Jars
guest: Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar
summary: Our adventurers continue their near-naked escape from beetles and cages and defilers and other nasty things in the desert. Also, a certain bedroom containing someone’s purple pants might make a return.

title: 1d8 Beetles
guest: Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar
summary: Trapped in a cage, assaulted by horrendous mind-control beetles, what can our adventurers do to save themselves?

title: Dwarven Bards!
guest: Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell
summary: Our adventurers try to remember where they left their characters only to find themselves in the clutches of Bezrak and his terrible conspirators from House Shom!

title: That's So Catapult
guest: Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Jason Snell;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Steve Lutz
summary: Our adventurers and their caravan continue their battle with the massive horde of giths. This episode contains: Fighting! Dead guards! Outriders! More fighting! More dead guards! Also: A catapult (not pictured).

title: Swan Song
guest: Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Erika Ensign;Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Omlol flees from his bar brawl! Will the party arrive in time to save him? Plus taunting from a caravan, bardic inspiration, Presta has bad luck, the catapult gets used (but not used well), and oh yeah, there’s this horde of Giths…

title: Do Giants Stack?
guest: Tony Sindelar;Erika Ensign;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Georgia Dow;Dan Moren
summary: Our adventurers salve their wounds until the caravan reaches a desert settlement. Their suspicions about Bezrak lead them to engage in sleuthing—some of it successful, and the rest of it by Carlos. Also, local muscle is called, and there’s a bar fight!

title: Chitin's Gonna Ichor
guest: Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell;Erika Ensign
summary: You may ask yourself, why is this oasis so plentiful? And you may ask yourself, why is this lady so beautiful? And you may tell yourself, this is not a beautiful tent. And you may tell yourself, these are not beautiful rugs!

title: War on Rugs
guest: Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Georgia Dow;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar
summary: In the wake of Omlol, Katch’ka, and Regdar getting in trouble for their door-related shenanigans, Carlos, Scale and Presta take on the next round of searching the caravan for creepy beetles. Water is fetched! Bribes are paid! Wicker baskets are moved mysteriously! An oasis is spotted! And is it true love at last for Omlol? (Spoiler: It’s not. Not at all.)

title: A Door Killed My Brother
guest: Erika Ensign;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Tony Sindelar;Georgia Dow;Dan Moren
summary: The three interlopers who broke the master’s door are under investigation! Can Carlos, Scale and Presta aid in their defense? The management of the caravan tries to unravel the events of our previous episode, and everyone ends up even more confused. Plus, Presta learns an important lesson about vouching.

title: A Night on the Caravan
guest: Erika Ensign;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Georgia Dow
summary: Paramount Pictures presents the Three Athas Brothers in their funniest film yet! Or to put it another way, Katch’ka and Omlol and Regdar find a whole bunch of wacky ways to get into trouble while the rest of the party is sleeping. Scale makes an uncomfortably enthusiastic new friend! Bowls of stew are ordered! Teak is shattered! And how that Kank got into my pajamas, I’ll never know…

title: A Hat and Some Bugs
guest: Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell;Georgia Dow;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren
summary: Our adventurers meet their new boss and set out with the caravan into the desert. Regdar attempts to show the worth of his MBA. Katch’ka startles his new co-workers with his leaping. And a glint of sunlight off metal spotted nearby proves just too exciting to pass up.

title: 0 Days Since Last Death
guest: Tony Sindelar;Erika Ensign;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Georgia Dow;Dan Moren
summary: We return to the strange world of Dark Sun and some of the characters from the first season of Total Party Kill! Fresh off their victory at the Face in the Stone, Carlos, Katch’ka, and Regdar are ready for a visit to the pub, but a familiar face stands in their way! Plus there’s a discussion of microeconomics, Carlos shows off his lack of social skills, we learn about warring trading houses and teak futures, and a few new traveling companions are introduced.

title: Turn the Slug Around
guest: Jason Snell;Erika Ensign;Serenity Caldwell;Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Sarah Barbour
summary: Our adventurers conclude their battle with Zarr and his (hob)goblin lackeys, and get some answers about Rutherford Urmbrusk and the Undermountain.Love maps? Check out Tony and Dan’s complete map for this adventure.See you in a couple of weeks for a return to our Dark Sun campaign, upgraded for D&D Fifth Edition, with some old friends and new faces!

title: Scorpion Rodeo
guest: Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour;Serenity Caldwell;Georgia Dow;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Our adventurers continue their battle through the scorpion kennel, and then force a final confrontation with Zarr.

title: Scorpion Rodeo
guest: Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour;Serenity Caldwell;Georgia Dow;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Our adventurers continue their battle through the scorpion kennel, and then force a final confrontation with Zarr.

title: There's Always a Lesser Goblin
guest: Monty Ashley;Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour;Georgia Dow;Serenity Caldwell;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz
summary: Kay returns, and our adventurers set out down a secret passage in pursuit of Zaar. Olestran finds a room he’s seen before. And one particular Goblin really drew the short straw.

title: There's Always a Lesser Goblin
guest: Monty Ashley;Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour;Georgia Dow;Serenity Caldwell;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz
summary: Kay returns, and our adventurers set out down a secret passage in pursuit of Zaar. Olestran finds a room he’s seen before. And one particular Goblin really drew the short straw.

title: A Slug and a Nice Mint Julep
guest: Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Georgia Dow;Sarah Barbour;Erika Ensign;Monty Ashley
summary: Son, I say, son, it’s time for our adventures to square off against Zarr, the gentleman boss of the southern dungeons. Hexes will be hurled, party members will be blinded, quarries will be sought, and ballistas will roll! Can this be Sluggy the Spirit Slug’s finest hour?

title: A Slug and a Nice Mint Julep
guest: Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Georgia Dow;Sarah Barbour;Erika Ensign;Monty Ashley
summary: Son, I say, son, it’s time for our adventures to square off against Zarr, the gentleman boss of the southern dungeons. Hexes will be hurled, party members will be blinded, quarries will be sought, and ballistas will roll! Can this be Sluggy the Spirit Slug’s finest hour?

title: International House of Kobolds
guest: Erika Ensign;Monty Ashley;Georgia Dow;Sarah Barbour;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Sluggy the spirit slug proves to be an amazing defense. Pieter Dragonforge gets it from all sides. Zaar is not impressed with the quality of his help. And the dungeon fills with more gas clouds than you’ll find in a Chipotle bathroom. It’s all just another day in the Undermountain.

title: International House of Kobolds
guest: Erika Ensign;Monty Ashley;Georgia Dow;Sarah Barbour;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Sluggy the spirit slug proves to be an amazing defense. Pieter Dragonforge gets it from all sides. Zaar is not impressed with the quality of his help. And the dungeon fills with more gas clouds than you’ll find in a Chipotle bathroom. It’s all just another day in the Undermountain.

title: This Guy's From Grand Rapids!
guest: Georgia Dow;Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: Our party takes stock after defeating the Rage Drake. Olestran commando-crawls up a ramp. Pretty medallions are found. (And Steve’s memory of medallion-grabbing is validated.) We don’t check for traps! Zarr’s bedchamber is discovered. Tapestry class is in session. Riswynn takes a dangerous nap. And all the while, Peter stands at a door, just itching for a fight.

title: This Guy's From Grand Rapids!
guest: Georgia Dow;Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell
summary: Our party takes stock after defeating the Rage Drake. Olestran commando-crawls up a ramp. Pretty medallions are found. (And Steve’s memory of medallion-grabbing is validated.) We don’t check for traps! Zarr’s bedchamber is discovered. Tapestry class is in session. Riswynn takes a dangerous nap. And all the while, Peter stands at a door, just itching for a fight.

title: That Ship Has Sailed to Winch Town
guest: Georgia Dow;Jason Snell;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour
summary: Hobgoblins and Drakes, oh my! Is this the boss battle Dragonforge and Associates has been waiting for? If you wanted to see us deploy strategy and roll a lot of dice, at long last you are going to get your wish.

title: That Ship Has Sailed to Winch Town
guest: Georgia Dow;Jason Snell;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour
summary: Hobgoblins and Drakes, oh my! Is this the boss battle Dragonforge and Associates has been waiting for? If you wanted to see us deploy strategy and roll a lot of dice, at long last you are going to get your wish.

title: Undermountain Thanksgiving
guest: Jason Snell;Georgia Dow;Steve Lutz;Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour;Monty Ashley;Serenity Caldwell
summary: Drowabunga! A mysterious stranger brings a fish feast to our hardy-but-exhausted adventurers. There’s much conversation, a little dice rolling, and Pieter throws a surprise party for an unwitting Kobold. Also, Kay and a different Kobold have a very nice conversation about trees and sandwiches.

title: Time is a Flat Rat
guest: Sarah Barbour;Erika Ensign;Serenity Caldwell;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley
summary: Rats in a pit! Flessa climbs out, but the rats won’t be kept down! Our adventurers attack some vermin, meet a new friend, and inspect some rooms. Plus Olestran does some things with rope and some nice arrow tricks too.

title: Should My Orb Still Be Glowing?
guest: Steve Lutz;Sarah Barbour;Serenity Caldwell;Erika Ensign;Jason Snell;Monty Ashley
summary: Dragonforge and Associates come around a corner to discover an entirely new room full of entirely new dangers! Melech and Pieter are clumsy lummoxes. A surprising feature of the new room is revealed. And while Flessa thinks they’re pointy kitties, if they bite and swarm, they’re probably rats. #ratfacts!

title: One Rat Deep
guest: Erika Ensign;Monty Ashley;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Sarah Barbour
summary: Our adventurers battle some goblins and ponder a stack of rats in the corner of a hallway. A clever goblin plan to trap our adventurers in an enclosed space has an apparently unanticipated side-effect. Pieter gets cold feet. Olestran rolls a critical smell. And at the end, we take a break for some talk about beer.

title: Blinded by Kobold Science
guest: Sarah Barbour;Jason Snell;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley
summary: In this episode, our adventurers make a gigantic mess in a Kobold lab. A Kobold intern proffers his resume. Someone gets sparkly, like a Twilight vampire. Undermountain cubicles are disrupted. We mispronounce many words. Plus: Secret recipes learned at Fictional Kobold Science University!

title: Blinded by Kobold Science
guest: Sarah Barbour;Jason Snell;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley
summary: In this episode, our adventurers make a gigantic mess in a Kobold lab. A Kobold intern proffers his resume. Someone gets sparkly, like a Twilight vampire. Undermountain cubicles are disrupted. We mispronounce many words. Plus: Secret recipes learned at Fictional Kobold Science University!

title: Bone Throne
guest: Sarah Barbour;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley;Erika Ensign
summary: Our party confronts spooky floating bones above a spooky throne. Pieter covets a dead man’s hat. Olestran makes a nifty trick shot that nobody else wants him to make. Doors are checked. Sandwiches are promised. This episode also serves as the series pilot for “CSI: Undermountain.”

title: Bone Throne
guest: Sarah Barbour;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley;Erika Ensign
summary: Our party confronts spooky floating bones above a spooky throne. Pieter covets a dead man’s hat. Olestran makes a nifty trick shot that nobody else wants him to make. Doors are checked. Sandwiches are promised. This episode also serves as the series pilot for “CSI: Undermountain.”

title: Don't Trust the Bugbear
guest: Erika Ensign;Sarah Barbour;Serenity Caldwell;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz;Monty Ashley
summary: What’s behind the door? Our adventurers discover a sleeping guard and a collection of prisoners alive and dead. When Flessa’s not trying to blame it on her rusty dagger, Pieter is consulting Paladinpedia about whether it’s okay to kill a bugbear. Speaking of bugbears, we have a feeling you’re about to have a favorite non-player character…

title: 2 Legit 2 Hit
guest: Monty Ashley;Erika Ensign;Serenity Caldwell;Jason Snell;Sarah Barbour;Steve Lutz
summary: Dragonforge and Associates continues its clean-up of the Goblin and Kobold infested room. Flessa gets out her hammer, which leads to a series of jokes you might expect. A prisoner is rescued, and a door is opened. Melech is good at orbs, everyone does the Funky Diagonal, and a Kobold Worm Priest has a really confusing day.

title: Rat Burrito
guest: Erika Ensign;Jason Snell;Monty Ashley;Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Sarah Barbour
summary: At last, our party meets up with actual, moving foes! Attempts at diplomacy ensue. Pillars are used as convenient forms of cover. And there’s a tiny personal tragedy involving a model train.

title: Wiggle the Something-or-Others
guest: Monty Ashley;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Jason Snell;Sarah Barbour
summary: Dragonforge and Associates continue their exploration of the eastern half of a corridor lined with statues. Pieter stands up. Flessa does some acrobatic moves. Riswynn professes her love of books. Melech lights up a statue. But will they finally reach the end of the hallway?

title: Death to All Statues
guest: Jason Snell;Sarah Barbour;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley
summary: Dragonforge and Associates reach the bottom of the pit in their large basket and discover the horrors beneath. A survivor is interrogated. Bodies are thrown in the basket. A door is detected, its building materials recognized, and a corridor full of statues is discovered! Also our adventurers consider whether or not to deploy the “erosion strategy,” and Pieter takes a seat and ponders his choices.

title: Garage Band of Heroes
guest: Jason Snell;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley;Sarah Barbour
summary: It’s time for a new adventure with new DMs and a new party! When we meet Dragonforge and Associates they are hanging out on some bean bag chairs in Mr. Dragonforge’s basement in a comfortable suburb of Waterdeep. But a strange note arrives and adventure calls them away to the Yawning Portal!Your new party (left to right, pixel art by Jesse Lane), is:Our dungeons master are Dan Moren and Tony Sindelar.

title: Garage Band of Heroes
guest: Jason Snell;Erika Ensign;Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Monty Ashley;Sarah Barbour
summary: It’s time for a new adventure with new DMs and a new party! When we meet Dragonforge and Associates they are hanging out on some bean bag chairs in Mr. Dragonforge’s basement in a comfortable suburb of Waterdeep. But a strange note arrives and adventure calls them away to the Yawning Portal!Your new party (left to right, pixel art by Jesse Lane), is:Our dungeons master are Dan Moren and Tony Sindelar.

title: Spooky Hat Club
guest: Dan Moren;Jason Snell;Tony Sindelar;Serenity Caldwell;Steve Lutz
summary: The adventure of the Temple of the Face in the Stone reaches its conclusion! But will our adventurers live to fight another day? Death-saving throws will be failed! Skill checks will be rolled! You’ve come this far, you might as well listen to one more episode with these knuckleheads.(This marks the end of this season of Total Party Kill. We’ll be back in a month or so with a shortish adventure with new characters, new DMs, and a new setting. But fear not! We’ll return to this group of characters again in the future.)

title: Who Knows Origami?
guest: Jason Snell;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Serenity Caldwell;Steve Lutz
summary: Our adventurers take stock, meet a new fungus-covered friend, discover the fate of the Red Cord mercenaries, and make their way back to the entrance to the temple, where they discover there’s one more battle left to fight.

title: Warlocks and Door Locks
guest: Jason Snell;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Serenity Caldwell;Steve Lutz
summary: Our Carlos-caused battle with the mushroom people continues. Nobody will escape unscathed! Doors will open and close. A retreat will be sounded. One member of the group will be revealed as a macabre MacGyver. And we learn that when you gaze into the mushroom, the mushroom looks back into you.

title: Do You Know the Mushroom Man?
guest: Jason Snell;Serenity Caldwell;Tony Sindelar;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren
summary: Our adventurers recover from their horrible wounds inflicted by the silkworm, take a rest, and then find the final room in this temple too intriguing to ignore. It’s all Carlos’s fault—he runs in where intelligent people fear to tread, and gets a face full of mushroom.

title: Pick Out a Pretty Headstone
guest: Jason Snell;Serenity Caldwell;Dan Moren;Steve Lutz;Tony Sindelar
summary: Our adventurers battle against the giant silkworm at the heart of the temple, and their lives are on the line. No, seriously, unless one of them makes exactly the right dice roll at the right time, they’re all gonna die.

title: The Fightin' Sand Rams
guest: Jason Snell;Serenity Caldwell;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Steve Lutz
summary: Carlos is at the bottom of the pit, our party is standing in a doorway, and a giant silkworm is about to strike! This isn’t going to go well, isn’t it? In fact, Carlos, you might want to just stay down there in the pit. It’s safer down there.

title: Let the Best Mul Win
guest: Serenity Caldwell;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Our adventurers continue their battle with Nala the Girl-liath and Daroc the Mul, who is even more unpleasant than Carlos. There’s also some exploring, Katchka makes critical rolls for nature and listening, curiously shaped mushrooms are discovered, and stick around for our terrifying cliffhanger!

title: Wraith Relations
guest: Jason Snell;Dan Moren;Serenity Caldwell;Tony Sindelar;Steve Lutz
summary: The battle with the scaled guardians, zombies, and wispy wraiths continues amid the dead bodies and braziers. Asteron eats a valuable gem. We debate the pronunciation of gith. Carlos gets caught thinking about something other than his job at just the wrong time. And we learn a valuable lesson about not letting your Minotaur do the negotiating for you.

title: Don't Lick the Serpent
guest: Dan Moren;Serenity Caldwell;Tony Sindelar;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz
summary: Our adventurers investigate snake chalk art, disturb some funeral urns, and discover that sometimes a room full of dead bodies is just a room full of dead bodies… just not this time.

title: Plaintive Moos
guest: Jason Snell;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell
summary: Our adventurers enter a room dominated by powerful winds. (But enough about that burrito Regdar ate back at the tavern.) A creepy whispering fountain and creepier whirling dust devils can’t be good, right? Also, Carlos gets really angry and attacks a statue.

title: The Orb Was Obvious
guest: Jason Snell;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Serenity Caldwell;Steve Lutz
summary: Our dungeon crawl through the desert temple continues. We poke some weird fungus with a stick and then investigate a room containing a very old knight. It’s like that scene in “Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade,” except it may be our adventurers who have chosen… poorly. Again.This is the first “new” episode of TPK. Older episodes originally appeared in the feed of The Incomparable and have been retconned into TPK episodes for new listeners.

title: Blazing Skeletons
guest: Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Serenity Caldwell;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz
summary: Skeletons and salt zombies! Oh my!

title: Danger's My Middle Name
guest: Jason Snell;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Serenity Caldwell;Steve Lutz
summary: A choice between two different magical fountains, plus some zombies and an angry skeleton.

title: Swimming Lessons
guest: Serenity Caldwell;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Steve Lutz;Jason Snell
summary: Obelisks with lightning bolts and a surprising encounter with marine life.

title: Torn Between Two Obelisks
guest: Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Serenity Caldwell;Jason Snell;Steve Lutz
summary: The stone temple finally comes into view, but it’s protected by two horrible obelisks that shoot lightning bolts.

title: Enter the Minotaur
guest: Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Tony Sindelar;Serenity Caldwell;Jason Snell
summary: A new adventurer joins the party, and everyone experiences a terrifying journey through the sandstorm vortex.

title: The Trouble With Eglath
guest: Steve Lutz;Serenity Caldwell;Tony Sindelar;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: Our adventurers finish their battle at the whirlwind, but at a somewhat horrible price.

title: Sun, Sand, and Tareks
guest: Jason Snell;Serenity Caldwell;Tony Sindelar;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren
summary: The battle by the sandstorm vortex continues, with Carlos on the move and unpleasant Tareks doing damage to our adventurers.

title: Bone Javelin
guest: Tony Sindelar;Serenity Caldwell;Steve Lutz;Dan Moren;Jason Snell
summary: Glass spiders and a horrific sandstorm vex our Dark Sun adventurers.

title: Kank Merchant
